title: S-Class Dungeon’s Mistress - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Black Belly   Carefree Protagonist   Clumsy Love Interests   Debts   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Dungeon Master   Dungeons   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hell   Hiding True Abilities   Inheritance   Kind Love Interests   Lack of Common Sense   Lazy Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Loyal Subordinates   Master-Servant Relationship   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Older Love Interests   Phoenixes   Possessive Characters   Reverse Harem   Sentimental Protagonist   Strong Love Interests   Succubus   Sword And Magic   Timid Protagonist   Tsundere   Weak Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: Choi Deok Koo   최덕구
description:
Adelaide, a succubus who inherited an F-class dungeon along with its massive debt.

In order to pay off the debt and avoid forfeiting an arm and a leg to Lucifer, she had no choice but to manage the dungeon.

She thought it was certainly impossible.

“Are you my master?”

“No, I’m just the master of this dungeon…”

“Yes, that’s right. If so, you’re my master.”

Somehow, she gained a perfect manager as soon as she arrived in the dungeon.

“Don’t touch that unsightly bastard. Eat me instead.”

Presenting oneself as nourishment was one of the greatest predatory demons in Devildom.

“I brought the prince’s neck as an offering to you.”

And offering her a legendary adventurer she didn’t even ask for.

Okay. If it has already come to this, then the goal is to become S-class!>
